attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition for heating allowance to be paid to pensioners living in Spain, wether or not they were resident in England on their 60th birthday, many imigrants get far more than a heating allowance and were not resident in the U.K. on their 60th birthday,why not us ?.
Anyone else agreeing with this petition please sign.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
